name: A Pirates' Treasure: Coin Collection Free
name_original: A Pirates' Treasure: Coin Collection Free
description:
The pirates have been defeated and we just notice that they have left something to us. Gold coins! A lot of coins! We need to collect the coins. However, this is not an easy task. Can you help us? We cannot leave the coins under the sea, right?

Highlights:
•Addictive and challenging gameplay
•Great on both iPhone and iPad
•Well designed graphics and sounds
•Game Center
•It's FREE!!!
